EmailTemplate.name: Broker Payment Not Cleared Accounts Team
EmailTemplate.subject: Broker Payment Not Cleared
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Accounts Team,
The brokerage invoice of {!CP} against Booking {!Name} for {!Unit} in {!Project} was submitted on {!Date}, but the payment is still pending. Please release the payment at the earliest to avoid escalations.
Thank You, Dynamix
